程序包 us.codecraft.webmagic.proxy

类 SimpleProxyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.proxy.SimpleProxyProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ProxyProvider

    public class SimpleProxyProvider
extends Object
implements ProxyProvider
    A simple ProxyProvider. Provide proxy as round-robin without heartbeat and error check. It can be used when all proxies are stable.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.7.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com Date: 17/4/16 Time: 10:18

      • returnProxy

        public void returnProxy​(Proxy proxy,
                        Page page,
                        Task task)
        从接口复制的说明: ProxyProvider
        Return proxy to Provider when complete a download.
        指定者:
        returnProxy 在接口中 ProxyProvider
        参数:
        proxy - the proxy config contains host,port and identify info
        page - the download result
        task - the download task

      • getProxy

        public Proxy getProxy​(Task task)
        从接口复制的说明: ProxyProvider
        Get a proxy for task by some strategy.
        指定者:
        getProxy 在接口中 ProxyProvider
        参数:
        task - the download task
        返回:
        proxy
